commands.name: az monitor scheduled-query create
commands.syntax:
az monitor scheduled-query create --condition
                                  --name
                                  --resource-group
                                  --scopes
                                  [--action-groups]
                                  [--auto-mitigate {false, true}]
                                  [--check-ws-alerts-storage {false, true}]
                                  [--condition-query]
                                  [--custom-properties]
                                  [--description]
                                  [--disabled {false, true}]
                                  [--evaluation-frequency]
                                  [--location]
                                  [--mad]
                                  [--severity]
                                  [--skip-query-validation {false, true}]
                                  [--tags]
                                  [--target-resource-type]
                                  [--window-size]
examples: az monitor scheduled-query create -g {rg} -n {name1} --scopes {vm_id} --condition "count 'Placeholder_1' > 360 resource id _ResourceId at least 1 violations out of 5 aggregated points" --condition-query Placeholder_1="union Event, Syslog | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | where EventLevelName=='Error' or SeverityLevel=='err'" --description "Test rule"

az monitor scheduled-query create -g {rg} -n {name1} --scopes {rg_id} --condition "count 'Placeholder_1' > 360 resource id _ResourceId at least 1 violations out of 5 aggregated points" --condition-query Placeholder_1="union Event, Syslog | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | where EventLevelName=='Error' or SeverityLevel=='err'" --description "Test rule"

commands.name: az monitor scheduled-query show
commands.summary: Show detail of a scheduled query.

commands.name: az monitor scheduled-query update
commands.syntax:
az monitor scheduled-query update [--action-groups]
                                  [--add]
                                  [--auto-mitigate {false, true}]
                                  [--check-ws-alerts-storage {false, true}]
                                  [--condition]
                                  [--condition-query]
                                  [--custom-properties]
                                  [--description]
                                  [--disabled {false, true}]
                                  [--evaluation-frequency]
                                  [--force-string]
                                  [--ids]
                                  [--mad]
                                  [--name]
                                  [--remove]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--set]
                                  [--severity]
                                  [--skip-query-validation {false, true}]
                                  [--subscription]
                                  [--tags]
                                  [--target-resource-type]
                                  [--window-size]
